Twister


*Twister stands next to Sinesis while looking at the Alliance Bas=
e hoping that they would finally find a home*

  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 11, 2=
000 10:12 PM
  Subject: Re: Sinesis


  Sinesis waits.

  "Alliance, we wis=
h to join you, we are former Predacons, but the Preds kciked us out, we wan=
t revenge and we want to side with you!" Sinesis said to the Alliance base.=
..
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 10:01 PM
    Subject: Re=
: Sinesis


    Twister

     
     
    Twister: "What do you expect me to=
 say? It doesn't look like anyone wants us."

    *Twister sighs and than t=
hinks about something and starts laughing lightly but loud enough for other=
s to hear. She is thinking about what Sinesis said back at the Predacon Bas=
e*

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 9:39 PM
      Subject: =
Re: Sinesis


      "Don't talk like that! We are not going to die!" Sinesi=
s said...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizar=
ds 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 8=
:38 PM
        Subject: Re: Sinesis


        Twister

        *Twister ari=
ves at the Alliance Base and stands next to Sinesis*

        Twister: "If =
they don't want us than we shall join....."

        *Twister frowns and si=
ts down on a rock*

        Twister: "Probably the Matrix."

        *Twist=
er bares her teeth as she stares at the Alliance Base*

          ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
          Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 6:39 PM
          Subject: Re:=
 Sinesis


          Sinesis ignores all food and walks toward the Alliance=
 base, he arives...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            F=
rom: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent:=
 Friday, August 11, 2000 4:17 AM
            Subject: Re: Sinesis


       =
     Twister


            Twister: "We probably shouldn't mention food."

=
            *Twister says to Sinesis even tough food was racing in her mind=
. All she could see was Apples, oranges, peaches, grapes, meat, coconuts, w=
atermellon, chocolate and food she'd never seen before! It was dark raving =
MAD! Twister tries not to think of food but fails. She would probably eat a=
 dead drone since she hadn't eaten anything since she first arived!*

     =
       Twister: "One potato, two potato, three potato, once I walk trough t=
hat that door potatos no more!"

            *Twister sings. She grabs her =
head and starts thinking of peaceful birds and frogs croaking and than a ni=
ce big fat juicy wild boar! Twister shakes her head and starts leaving her =
mind blank like a white sheet of paper while her stomich growls and continu=
es to follow Sinesis*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
     From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sen=
t: Friday, August 11, 2000 3:12 AM
              Subject: Re: Sinesis


   =
           "I could go for some food right now." Sinesis said. He looked on=
 the ground as some ants walked by. He hadn't eaten anything in a while, bu=
t he wasn't about to eat the ants...
                ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, August 10, 2000 11:49 PM
      =
          Subject: Re: Sinesis


                Twister


                =
*Twister looks at the Predacon Base and than follows Sinesis*

            =
    Twister: "I don't think we'll ever find a team that wants us, and prett=
y please with chocolate on top, don't give me a speech, I've had too many o=
f those in my past."

                *Twister says to Sinesis as she follo=
ws him*

                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  =
From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  =
Sent: Thursday, August 10, 2000 11:05 PM
                  Subject: Sinesis=



                  Sinesis waits in front of the Predacon base.

        =
          "That's it, Predacons, I'm taking my business somewhere else, you=
 greedy incompetent slagging piles!" Sinesis called. out. He looked at Twis=
ter and laughed. He didn't know what he was saying until it came out. He wa=
lked away from the Predacon base...

--------------------------------------=
----------------------------------------
